subject: Policy General
body:
Hello!

When my item arrived at my local shop, I was away on vacation, so I called them, and asked them to hold on to my parcel untill I came back. When I got back, they had returned it, telling met hat the carrier told them, that they could not keep it any longer than two weeks.

I would like you to send it again and will off course pay for the extra expences.

Best regards

Mette Br√∏ns S√∏rensen

We're having trouble delivering your order of eBay item 152181109275 from dareng1970 (ORA: A1519588676NO). This is usually caused by an incomplete or unrecognized address or phone number.

Please review the delivery address and phone number. The address we tried to deliver to is Aa,,Dverberg,default,8485,Norway.  The phone number is 47281844.

If these details are incorrect, please edit them here:
http://payments.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?UserAddresses <http://payments.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?UserAddresses&cmd=standalone> &cmd=standalone

Note: We can't ship to an address in a different country than originally listed. Also, we don‚Äôt shi

Hey,

The phone is unlocked. The issue is that the phone is an unlocked GSM phone, while Verizon is a CDMA carrier. The buyer purchased the phone thinking it would work with Verizon, since the description said it was unlocked. No unlocked GSM phone will work with Verizon, unless it is also CDMA capable.

Thanks.

Dan

We understand that your customer has opened a case because the Black iPhone 7 Plus 256GB the phone is factory locked.We understand that this has been an upsetting transaction and appreciate your continued patience. We want to work together with you to resolve this issue on both sides.
>  
> We also appreciate your patience while we respond to your email. We have had a recent influx of emails, and since each one is answered personally it has taken us some time to reply to everyone.
>  
> Because of the nature of the complaint, we'd like to have as much information as possible to make sure we make an appropriate decision. We have put the case on hold until 10/11/2016 to allow your buyer time to provide the additional documentation we requested.

Thank you for your attention to this case. I contacted the Louis Vuitton store to see if I could get a statement of authenticity and was told that isn't a service that any of their stores offer. 

While I wait for a returned phone call tomorrow regarding other options, I've attached pictures of the bag and the mailing box. The pictures point out the flaws in bag like, no interior tag with "made in..." on the side. The date tag coincides with the location on the bag. The labeling is printed on not stamped into the bag. The bag smells of a strong plastic scent. 

Once I received the bag, I used an article on eBay "How to spot a fake Louis Vuitton bag date codes" and it confirmed my suspicion. 

I will wait to hear back from an EBay specialist. 

Thank you!
Toi White

Not much to look at, but clean and friendly wait staff. Our service was not super fast, but I chalk that up to getting... This is a great old place, the kind that seems stuck (in a good way) in another era.  The restaurant is located in a large white farm house, which is... Just finished enjoying the breakfast buffet. Bacon and sausage were really good, and the biscuits were mile high and perfect. Gravy had good flavor. Our... This is my favorite restaurant in Marshfield, by far. Lynnette ~ Dealer

I would like to remind you that we received a damaged kit and eBay didn't help us at all here. I would really appreciate if you remove the defect from our account. We are loosing business right now, because of the fraudulent eBay customer that put a scam on us and now we loosing business because of that defect. How it's fair, we have pictures from the manufacturer showing that the kit arrived damaged, the customer was also reported to eBay and ic3.gov, and now we can't sell more than 1000 items on eBay because of that? We already explained the situation before. The refund was not issued on time because the kit arrived damaged and we were waiting for a response from eBay, but instead eBay issued full refund automatically during labor day weekend when all businesses were closed.

Regards,
Alex

>    - Special packaging is needed due to safety risks when mailing the
>    item. Samsung will provide this special packaging.
>    - Samsung has confirmed cross-border trade (CBT) customers will also
>    be able to exchange and should contact their regional Samsung number for
>    specific details of pick up or return in their area.
>    - Samsung is required to exchange the item regardless of where the
>    consumer purchased it.
NULL

1. The item (scooter) arrived with a damaged box frame and with the box torn in multiple areas (hidden damage was unknown at the time).
2. Item (scooter) was damaged, and parts were missing. Seller (crtmoto-depot) was immediately notified approximately 3 weeks ago,

3. Seller (crtmoto-depot) indicated that they would get back to me with a resolution and tracking number for the replacement parts that were sent (about 3 weeks ago)
4. Spoke with Chris (crtmoto-depot) 2 weeks ago who indicated that he would have someone contact us by back right away. Someone called three days later but didn't leave any details or information in the message; they only left a message to call them back. We called them back 3 times, no one answered and calls were not returned.
5. I have yet to receive any tracking information on items that were supposedly sent out two weeks ago. It appears that nothing has been sent out; and it seems that no one is treating this as a priority.
6. The scooter has been sitting unusable in my garage for almost 3 weeks. This has been a horrible experience; and at this point, I just want my money back.
7. I have a requested a Full Refund in the amount of $  from the seller with details on how/when the item will be picked up.
8. This morning, I received a message stating 'sent you asap' with no additional details. I have no idea what was sent. I'm hoping that it was

subject: Setting up a vero page (Home-essential-uk)
body:
Good morning eBay

 

I've had to contact through the office email as I can't seem to get the
option to email you from the ebay account (Home-essential-uk) sorry.

 

We've had some problems with another seller using our images/copy and
selling our items without authorisation, and we've been advised to set
up on the Vero Programme. 

 

I've been trying to read the advice on how to set up a Vero page but I
just can't seem to figure out to do it sorry. Would it be possible to
get some step-by-step instructions on how to do it please?

 

I'm usually pretty good at this stuff but it seems this one has me
stumped sorry! Any advice you could offer would be much appreciated,
thank you.

 

Many thanks

 

Alexandra Townley

Hi,

It is now October 5th so it has been dragged for close to 3 months since
the original purchase and I still have not received the item yet.  Per your
suggestion I waited for re-delivery but nothing has been delivered yet.
Also you were not able to provide any tracking numbers.  At this point I
think I do deserve a full refund as this is a fail on eBay's part since
"Technically it is still in transit" does not make sense anymore.

If I don't receive a refund within a few days I will be opening a dispute
with my bank.  Dispute will always go thru if delivery cannot be
confirmed.  Please advise, thanks.

Hi,

The problem is an error with the global shipping program side.
White Sage (Salvia Apianna) is NOT on the restricted list for plants ("plants
are restricted for import by CITES (Convention on International Trade in
Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora)".
So your email response is is, to put it mildly, COMPLETE NONSENSE.

I ship white sage (Salvia Apianna), all over the world.   This includes
Singapore, (as well as Spain, Japan, Germany, Canada, Poland, England,
Thailand, etc. etc.).

Specifically, for Singapore, I have a [CERTIFICATION FROM THE USDA, United
States Department of Agriculture, Phytosanitary certificate, which states
that the sage has been inspected, ALSO Singapore customs reads my
certification for import into their country and accepted NUMEROUS packages
of sage (some as much as 20 pounds at one time).

This is my business, for the ebay global shipping program to arbitrarily
confiscate (and then "resell" the item to "recoup there costs") is
COMPLETELY RIDICULOUS.  My wholesale customer, in Singapore, is now
wondering what to do,  he has NOT BEEN REIMBURSED, NOR has he received his
(rightful property) sage!   That sage that was "confiscated" was extremely
valuable, high quality sage in Signapore is expensive!

Again,  I ship sage (salvia apianna) as a wholesaler, this is my business,
white sage is NOT RESTRICTED, IN ANY COUNTRY,

subject: Re: Re: Een gebruiker melden SR# 1-84329380323
body:
Goedemorgen,

Ik heb in augustus een aankoopbedrag teruggekregen voor een product dat
niet aan de beschrijving voldeed, echter de verzendkosten heb ik toen niet
teruggestort gekregen. Mij is in onderstaande mail uitgelegd dat de
verzendkosten teruggestort zouden moeten worden door Pitney Bowes en dat
dit 2 tot 3 weken in beslag neemt meestal. We zijn nu 6 weken verder maar
ik heb het bedrag van de verzendkosten nog steeds niet terug mogen
ontvangen. Ik kan echter via Paypal geen geschil openen omdat het bedrag
van het product en de verzendkosten als 1 boeking wordt gezien, ondanks dat
het 2 bedragen zijn. Hierdoor krijg ik steeds de melding dat het bedrag
reeds is terugbetaald (bedrag van het product heb ik ontvangen) en dat ik
geen geschil kan openen. Erg vervelend. Ik zou alsnog graag mijn
verzendkosten terug ontvangen dus hoe ga ik dat oplossen? Bedankt vast voor
uw reactie.

Vriendelijke groeten,
Marc Netelenbos

Op 27 augustus 2016 12:47 schreef Marc Netelenbos <marc.netelenbos@gmail.com
>:

> Hallo,
>
> Bedankt voor de snelle reactie! Het is helemaal duidelijk nu, ik zie het
> bedrag wel weer op mijn rekening verschijnen. Ik weet nu in ieder geval hoe
> het zit en dat het vanzelf goed komt. Bedankt voor de goede en snelle
> service!
>
> Vriendelijke groeten,
> Marc Netelenbos
>
> Op 27 augustus 2016 12:27 schreef <customerhelp_nl@ebay.com>:

Enter your response here:	Hello Tyler,From your message I believe I may not get a chance to explain my case before you make a final decision.Here is come clarification on the item that you may find helpful.I didn't sell this item as a working amp. The item is vintage, 60+ years old, and left my hands in the condition stated in the ad. I believe that the buyer mishandled the item which resulted in the damage.As the ad states:- the item is in original condition. - the item was untested in regards to function under power.- all transformers appear to test correctly with meter.I specified that the amp was intact with it's original parts, untested tubes, and capacitors dated 1947. Like any antique it's value is not in it's ability to perform it's original function. The buyer stated in an ebay message that he ran power through it using a variac and THEN found that the output transformer was bad.Most electronic technicians would consider turning on an amp of this age with a variac an irresponsible procedure, without testing other aspects first like measuring the old capacitors, and first testing the tubes that are in it or using other known good tubes.With an old amplifier such as this, using a variac alone is akin to putting gas in a 60 year old car that hasn‚Äôt been run in 30 years, starting it up without checking or changing the oil, and expecting it to take i

 Thank you for your support. I took the item to DHL but they said they do
not ship faulty Note 7. They only ship the new Note 7.

So this phone cannot be shipped. I have already informed the seller about
this.

Regards,
 Godfrey

> This is Barbara. I am the person with whom you are dealing. I have no
> intention of fighting with you either.  You sent the coin to NGC. They gave
> you their opinion. They, as well as PCGS, offer their " opinions " for a
> fee. They stated "unc details - improperly cleaned." When I examined the
> coin, I saw absolutely  no cleaning whatsoever.
>
>  I prefer to sell coins with their original holders, as originally sold,
> not in a slab. Is it possible I made a mistake - yes. I am human. But it is
> just as possible that NGC made a mistake grading it Human beings grade
> coins. Grading is an art not a science.
>
> In any event, when the items are received I will issue your refund.
>

no problem. I did want to talk with buyer but he does not seem to want to. What i am a little concerned about is that it is possible he is a fluke dealer and pulled part to fix theirs as he has one in picture that he compared to. He also has his feedback private so i cant be sure if he does buy and sell fluke test equipment.  In his picture it looked like a fluke piece of test equipment.
I also wanted to talk to him and see if he is a repair shop and if its repairable if it was really not working
Also its not easy to just click refund and ship back to ontario because if he put a value on it at all. I would have to pay tax on that at 13%. we could have got around that if he would have contacted me.

my ad did say no returns also so he should have had me do a few test on unit and send him some pictures so he knew worked well due to what it is. 

Thanks
Trevor Blue

subject: Member copying my pictures and listing
body:
My member name is golfchamp1976. I listed an iPhone 7 with pictures I took and still have on my own phone for auction. Someone from the Ukraine won the auction, but I had already stated that I don't ship internationally. After a couple of hours member shopgirl circle-95 made a listing selling same item using my exact pictures and even my exact written item description! The only picture they didn't use was the 1 picture that had my hand in the picture! Help! I contacted the member & at first they said they were stock pictures then when I told them about my table, couch & extra ear plugs in pictures they claimed that everyone has those similar things! Help! Don't know what to do!!!

Sent from XFINITY Connect Mobile App

To who it may concern


We notice that some other autorised seller have been claiming intellectual
rights in some of our lisitngs. The right of selling in Europe is not
exlusive for them, there are more that one authorised seller and we buy all
our INOAR products throught one of them which is the main INOAR supplier
for France and also Europe. The people who have complaining about the
intelectual right they have the right to also sell INOAR product but no the
exclusivity as they argue. We are presenting all our documentation
attached, all from our authorised INOAR distribuitor WHICH IS ALSO WILLING
TO BE CONTACTED UPON ANY OTHER DOCUMENT OR INFORMATION YOU MAY NEED.
Eventually we belive this is a dirty move from our competitors in order to
kick us out of the business, however we can present you ANY INFORMATION
REQUIERE BY YOU in order to proves that we are authorised online retailers.
Feel fre to also contact me for anything you need but we really need to
solve this issue ASAP as christmas is just round the corner. We really
apprecite your help and understading on this matter.

-- 
*Kind Regards*




*Mauricio Vega*
*Director*

subject: Copied my exact listing
body:
I listed my iPhone 7 4 days ago for auction. I had a buyer from Ukraine won it. I said I wouldn't ship over seas. Within a few hours shopfullcircle-95     Item#142138047222 made a listing using all my exact pictures exact left the last picture which had my hand in the picture. They even used my exact typed description to list the same item! I messages this person & at first they tried to say they were eBay stock pictures! When I mentioned my couch & other things in the pictures they responded that lots of people have red couches & my table! I am outraged!!! Help!!!!!

subject: Re: Regarding Case 5111112436 SR# 1-82372927814
body:
Hi again I need your help this time relating this case. 

I still haven't receive my money back. As Paypal can see that I won the case but eBay is confusing Paypal, by allowing Paypal to gave full refund to customer. I already contacted you once asking you to double check about the information you have provided to Paypal. But you confirm to me that information is correct. So I contacted the Financial Ombudsman Service, the UK‚Äôs official expert in sorting out problems with financial services to step in on my case. I have waited them to sort things out for a month, and the result is that this issue relates only to eBay relating selling the item to a customer. And eBay is only one who can tell Paypal where the money should go. 

Would you mind to pass the information to your manager and let me know whenever your manager is free? I know you are recheck my case so many times but I just want you to double check again for me. 

I hope you understand my feeling, loosing the money with no reason and no one helps. 

It is very difficult to deal with eBay.com as I am living in the UK. So can you make things easier for me please? Otherwise, I have to ask the financial company to step in to eBay side about the case. 

Regards

subject: Victron Energy B.V. notice of infringement, graag de advertenties z.s.m. verwijderen!!
body:
VeRO Melding van inbreuk

eBay International AG, t.a.v.: eBay VeRO programma

 

 

Datum:  5 oktober  2016

 

 

Beste eBay,

 

 

 

Ik, de ondergetekende, verklaar te goeder trouw dat:

 

Ik de eigenaar ben van bepaalde intellectuele eigendomsrechten of een tussenpersoon ben die volledig geautoriseerd is om ten behoeve van de eigenaar te handelen ('IP-eigenaar');

 

ik oprecht van mening ben dat de aanbiedingen hieronder (aangeduid door een objectnummer) objecten of materialen bevatten die niet geautoriseerd zijn door de IP-eigenaar, diens tussenpersoon of de wet en daarom de rechten van de IP eigenaar schenden; en

 

de informatie in deze melding en verklaring waar en correct is.

 

Eigenaar van de intellectuele eigendomsrechten:     Victron Energy B.V.

 

Adres van de eigenaar van de intellectuele eigendomsrechten:   De Paal 35, 1351 JG Almere-Haven (Nederland)           __

 

U kunt contact met mij opnemen op: meijnen@lmoadvocaten.nl

 

Naam en functie:         Quirijn Meijnen, advocaat intellectuele eigendom

subject: Policy General
body:
Hello,

As this email comes from ebay.co.uk, i'll try to reply it in English. My
apologies for any mistake i may do as it's not my first language.

The original delivery was rejected on arrival, as the package was highly
damaged.In Spain, the parcel company was SEUR and the T# SEU040008991180 .
They were supposed to return the package back to UK, to your International
Delivery Platform, as soon as possible. The tracking number you originally
provided was UPAAA000000181423052. So, the returning address must be
seller's address (186 Hamilton Rd, Felixstowe IP11 7DU, UK), not mine. You
can reach the store at +44 1394 671453.

Please, do not hesitate to contact me by mail or phone (+34 645161728)  in
the event that there's anything on my side i could do to ease the return
and refund process.

Thank you in advance for your help on this issue.

Best regards,

Jose Tomas

body:

Hello eBay VeRO Program,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking either link below:

How would you rate the support you received?

 You can copy the following URL into your browser to rate:

  https://help.ableton.com/requests/2010028/satisfaction/new/N0t0xozoRssg2KB2l0SQCDqac?locale=1

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

----------------------------------------------

eBay VeRO Program, Oct 1, 15:45 CEST

Thank you for contacting us. 

We are pleased to inform you that the following listing(s) you reported have been removed from eBay in response to the Notice of Claimed Infringement you recently sent:

bulk_distribution
322253356316

We have notified the seller and all participating bidders that the listing(s) has been removed due to your request.  

If the Notice of Claimed Infringement contained items that are not listed above you will receive a separate email communication about those items. These notices may arrive at different times (over a period of up to several hours) as items for different sellers are processed separately.

If you should have any questions or concerns regarding this matter, please do not hesitate to contact us again.

VeRO Program
eBay Trust & Safety

hi, i understand your mean, but  please  see the whole thing ,   my return
address isn't the delivery  address, do you  know  this point????  do you
know ?    the delivery  address is  in hongkong city,  my   ebay return
address is   shenzhen city,   they are  2 diffierent  cities.   do you know?

what mistake i did?      the buyer return the items to me, he gave me  the
another tracking number  2202643041 , you can track it on www.dhl.com

, yes, i see it  have been deliveried, but the address isn't my address,
did you see my  ebay return address in ebay  return request?  did you see
it ?   the buyer  ask  dhl  to ship to another address,   not my ebay
 return  address  in return request.  so  please understand this point.


let me see  the whole  thing,  i do  all as ebay asked,   ebay policy
asked.   1, when the buyer have a return request,   the return request
reason isn't my fault, right ? i  accepted and choose the address.
2,  the address  in return request  isn't   the delivery  address in return
request,    you have to think this  point,    it is very important.    or
everybody can return to  another address,  how do  business  on ebay in the
fututre.

if you want me to refund, i can do, but   i have told you all ,   please
give me your  reply.  i don't know what mistake i did.  i  did all , as
ebay policy.
waiting for your reply
regards

Dear Morita, 

 

My name is Kim, I'm contacting you from eBay's Global Shipping Programme department regarding your eBay Item. 

In order for you to get your money back for this item you will have to open a case with Paypal. 

 

 

To file a dispute on PayPal:

Log in to your PayPal account. 

Click on Resolution Centre near the top of the page. 

Click Report a Problem. 

Select Item dispute then click Continue. 

Click Find transaction ID. A new window displays your transaction history. 

Click the Transaction ID you want to dispute. 

Click Continue then follow the onscreen instructions. 

Escalate the case to receive a refund

 

I know that you would have liked to receive your item and again we are really sorry for this experience. 

 

We thank you for all of your eBay business and hope that these steps have been helpful.

subject: Due interessanti Corsi di Formazione
body:
CORSO DI FORMAZIONE INSEGNANTI E TERAPISTI YOGA, YOGA-TERAPIA E
AYURVEDA A CISTERNINO

 Il corso di formazione Insegnanti e terapisti Yoga, Yoga Terapia e
Ayurveda ha il patrocinio del World Movement for Yoga and Ayurveda,
della European Yoga Federation, della Confederazione Ufficiale
Italiana di Yoga e della Scuola Internazionale di Yoga e Ayurveda
C.Y.Surya.
 Nasce con l'obbiettivo di creare nuove e pi√π complete figure
professionali nel campo dello Yoga, dello Yoga terapia e
dell'Ayurveda, "capaci" in entrambe le discipline e in grado di
rispondere alla richiesta sempre pi√π pressante di recupero della
salute sia a livello naturale-salutistico, sia spirituale. Gli allievi
a fine corso saranno in grado di tenere lezioni di Yoga o Ayurveda e
di orientare le persone ad un corretto stile di vita; potranno essere
da guida nel recupero del benessere fisico e mentale, attraverso
l'applicazione di una dieta appropriata, consigliando pratiche di yoga
o l'uso di rimedi ayurvedici; suggerire buone norme per mantenere il
giusto equilibrio e la perfetta armonia tra mente e corpo, secondo la
costituzione; eseguire pratiche terapeutiche individuali come massaggi
ed altre numerose tecniche ayurvediche.
 Il corso sar√† diretto dal Maestro Amadio Bianchi con la
partecipazione di altri docenti di fama nazionale e internazionale.
Avr√† la durata di quattro anni e si svolge

subject: Re: eBay Customer Support,  SR# 1-87550088403
body:
Hello Christopher,

I appreciate your email, but the shipment tracking information I received showed that the delivery took place in a town about 15 miles away from me. How do you explain that?

My address is clear. I order an identical item from the same seller 10 days prior. It arrived fine. 

What you are saying just does not make sense. The facts are that my item was delivered to someone in the wrong city. As the shipper, it is eBay's responsibility to deliver purchased items to the correct address. It is not my responsibility to follow up with customs or anyone else to find out what happened.

Sorry, but eBay is responsible to correct this error. Please let me know when you have it resolved.

Robin Deyoe

> So I understand that you have provided

Am I responsible the damaged packaging??
I am humbly requesting ebay to help me!
This seller fooled me.Please help me!

Hi Jesse, Attached is a screen shot of the email I received from beckett today. Beckett is one of 2 industry leaders in authenticating and grading sports cards. Their web page is Beckett.com if you need to learn more about them. PSA is the other industry leader for grading. I choose to use Becket as I have for many years. This is the first time I have had a altered status of a card. 

I sent the card in to be graded as the auction stated "PSA ready" and the card looked really nice. I guess if its too good to be true it probably is. Becket has placed the card in a protective holder that states ‚Äúaltered‚Ä?and I will have the card back on Monday and I will submit pictures of the altered status from Beckett. The fedex tracking number from Beckett to myself is 595420414806. In the meantime I have provided a screenshot of email and the the status of the card. But rest assured I will send pictures Monday when the card is retired from Beckett.

body:
Dear e-bay Vero,

Thank you for your e-mail, let me further clarify the reason of 
infringement.

The items offered in these listings are using the registered trademark, 
registered under The United States Trademark and Patent Office, reg.no: 
3554534, 2098696 as intellectual property of Sony Computer 
Entertainment Inc.
The items offered in these listings are not produced by the 
right-holder or any other licensed company and therefore constitutes an 
IPR infringement.


With kind regards,

Ivan Koteski Mitrovski

REACT Online Enforcement Department
ikoteskimitrovski@react.org
Tel. +389 2 615 0550
        +389 2 322 8244
Fax.+389 2 329 8007

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This email is from c.v. REACT U.A. The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential to the intended recipient .
They may not be disclosed to or used by or copied in any way by anyone other than the intended recipient.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------


> From:		 vero@ebay.com
> To:		 impsonyplaystation@snbreact.org
> Date sent:	 4 Oct 2016 07:45:52 -0700
> Subject:		 eBay VeRO Program - NOCI Received - More Information Requested

> 
> Hello, 

> Thank you for contacting the VeRO Program.

> We reviewed the Notice of Claimed Infringement you sent us today

Hello,



Thank you for your follow-up of this case. At this point, I am in
capability of demonstrating with several authentication documents from
different reputable third parties, including custom minifigure
manufacturers and reputable businesses within the Lego community, that the
Bizarro figure I received is indeed fake/counterfeit. It required
considerable time and effort for me to achieve this. At the same time, I
have good reason to believe (99% certain) that the remaining figures are
originals. I do not have the time (which, you would agree, is money), the
effort, and resources to obtain certification as to their originality.



I have dedicated considerable effort to following eBay‚Äôs procedure to
submitting the claim and obtain the protection and satisfaction that, as a
client, consumer, and long-time buyer of eBay I deserve. What I have
obtained so far instead has been considerable dissatisfaction and
frustration with a system that is not clear and that has provided me with
contradictory instructions, offers, and guarantees. While I, the client and
consumer have to get worn out with a process that does not seem to foresee
a partially counterfeit item, the seller remains silent and shields himself
behind a system that enables him to ignore the responsibility that he
should face not only as a seller, but also out of honesty (getting to the
poin

[eBay]
RE: Re: Regarding the Army of Darkness Figure, item 162172758280 SR# 1-86461311410



Hi Nick,





Thank for responding back to us.



Just to kindly note also, with regards to the actual reshipment address. We are unable to ship an item to a different country. We can only ship to the original country in the order details which in this case would be Denmark. So as mentioned previously once we receive it back to the Shipping Facility, we will email you requesting a Danish Address and at that point you can choose to deliver it to your home address or your work address Nick.



Again, I do apologise for the inconvenience and delay in receiving your Figurine, I'm sure you're very anxious to add to your collection.





If you have any other concerns about the order then please do not hesitate in responding back to us.



Thank you again for your email, you have a great weekend.



Ross

Global Shipping Tea

I won't know for sure until the delivery whether all's good.

I am anticipating a happy resolution.

7515 Kelly

This is Barbara. I am the person with whom you are dealing. I have no intention of fighting with you either.  You sent the coin to NGC. They gave you their opinion. They, as well as PCGS, offer their " opinions " for a fee. They stated "unc details - improperly cleaned." When I examined the coin, I saw absolutely  no cleaning whatsoever.

 I prefer to sell coins with their original holders, as originally sold, not in a slab. Is it possible I made a mistake - yes. I am human. But it is just as possible that NGC made a mistake grading it Huma

subject: Re: Important Case (5113874754) Update: Your Action Required SR# 1-86987562398
body:
Hello. I received the label and dropped this item at the US Post office and the next day it was returned to me.
 
I got a 5 page letter saying that The USPS will ship motorized balance boards or hover boards only using Standard Post/Parcel Select.
 
It also says that the board must not have more than 2 batteries and each most not exceed 100 watts of power.
 
 
I am going to see a new label, preferably from FedEx or UPS, which allows this Boosted Board to be mailed.
 
Please get back to me, as this issue has been delayed again and I want to take care of this ASAP!
 
Have a great day! Smile More!

 
 
-----Original Message-----

claim/case.

subject: Infringement issue
body:
Hello,


I am writing on behalf of *galaxy gift curtains.*



Our brand ‚ÄúAmbesonne‚Ä?is a registered trademark. When you search ‚Äúshower
curtain‚Ä?many Ambesonne shower curtains are listed on the first pages
however most of these are replicas or unauthorized copies of our shower
curtains.


We do have about 6 authorized sellers which sell our products but the ones
other than these sellers are fake. We don‚Äôt have any resellers from China
and our products aren‚Äôt made or located in China either.


These unauthorized sellers are using our designs, duplicating them and
selling counterfeits as the real thing. They are using our name, our work
and our images and selling these products which normally we should be
selling, especially on the first page. This this is affecting our sales
because most of the sales of our shower curtains and designs are going to
fake Ambesonne sellers.



This issue is not only about sales. These fakes sellers cannot print the
real designs and reach our quality levels with illegally copied designs and
images so this is also affecting our brand reputation and causing bad
feedback as these low quality products are reaching customers. Because of
poor customer satisfaction, our overall revenue which would normally be
reached by our Ambesonne sales has also decreased.





Unfortunately it‚Äôs very difficult to fix the damage thes

The Software & Information Industry Association (‚ÄúSIIA‚Ä? is a U.S. trade association that represents the intellectual property interest of numerous companies in the software and digital content industries, including but not limited to Apple Inc. SIIA is authorized to act on behalf of SIIA members whose copyright and other intellectual property rights it believes to be infringed as described herein.



SIIA is providing this notice pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 USC ¬ß 512 and eBay‚Äôs Verified Rights Owner (VeRO) Program

to make eBay, Inc. aware of material that infringes the exclusive copyright and other rights of one or more SIIA members. The extensive copyright infringement involves, but is not limited to, the unlawful sale and distribution of content. SIIA has registered through VeRO to report such listing on behalf of our members. johnjeb68

Sent via email

 

DMCA / EUCD NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENTS                                                                              

 

 

Dear Sir / Madam,

 

I, Philip Taylor certify under penalty of perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Spectrasonics Ltd or the owner of certain intellectual property rights.

I have a good faith belief that the item(s) or material(s) listed below are not authorized by law for use by the seller and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights. I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

This seller is using an illegal copy of my client software and selling it for profit.

subject: Fwd: Inoar listing intellectual rights
body:
To who it may concern


We notice that some other autorised seller have been claiming intellectual
rights in some of our lisitngs. The right of selling in Europe is not
exlusive for them, there are more that one authorised seller and we buy all
our INOAR products throught one of them which is the main INOAR supplier
for France and also Europe. The people who have complaining about the
intelectual right they have the right to also sell INOAR product but no the
exclusivity as they argue. We are presenting all our documentation
attached, all from our authorised INOAR distribuitor WHICH IS ALSO WILLING
TO BE CONTACTED UPON ANY OTHER DOCUMENT OR INFORMATION YOU MAY NEED.
Eventually we belive this is a dirty move from our competitors in order to
kick us out of the business, however we can present you ANY INFORMATION
REQUIERE BY YOU in order to proves that we are authorised online retailers.
Feel fre to also contact me for anything you need but we really need to
solve this issue ASAP as christmas is just round the corner. We really
apprecite your help and understading on this matter.

-- 
*Kind Regards*




*Mauricio Vega*
*Director*

BRAZILIANHAIRPRODUCTS LTD
*REG. NUMBER 10377120*
6 Salton Square I 315 Coral Apartments I London E14 7GL I Phone:
+447791868525

body:
Hello Ebay,

I found that the address in China and it will cost me a high price to ship
the item. So can I get refund a hundred and keep the item with me?

Thanks
Best,
Alqarni

Hello,

I don't have other return address for it. Only the PO box. This is the
return address I received from my supplier.

I'm very sorry but this is not my problem that the buyer's payment wasn't
completed. On my listing I marked "immediate payment". This problem is from
your end and you cannot put it on me. I did everything under ebay's terms
and conditions. I don't understand this situation. You should take
responsibility for that. Please put back the money on my account. This is
not fair.

Best regards,

Amir

One of our Copyright poster designs has appeared on Ebay again. One seller has 8 separate listings(!), and there are another 2 sellers with forgeries of our design.

subject: Policy General
body:
Hi ebay and thanks for contacting me regarding my missing item.
I have been updated on a regular basis about the location of the item. The
latest info was that the item had arrived in Oslo on 31.august and that is
was awaiting pickup. That is the last update on the item. I have not
received any pick up notice or been contacted by any of the norwegian
delivery services og post offices.
About a week ago I contacted the norwegian national post office with the
international tracking number I was given by ebay. I also contacted all the
major delivery services in Norway to see if they had any track of the item.
Non of them can find any info on the item or the tracking number, They all
tell me the same, that there is no info on the package ever arriving in
Norway.

My adress and phone number is 100 % correct. I have used that adress for
alle other ebay orders, and other mail services, for the last eight years.
There has never  been any problems with delivery before this incident.
Please try to resend it to Stensgata 33 A, 0358 Oslo, Norway. There is also
a possibility of sending the package to my working adress: Kenneth
Erlandsen, Arba inkludering As, Ringeriksveien 193, 1339 V√∏yenenga.

I really hope this sorts out and that the package arrives.

Thank you for the assistance.

Yours sincerely
Kenneth Erlandsen

2016-10-06 2:05 GMT+02:00 <customerhelp@ebay.co

Dear  Sirs,

Thank you  for your  info.
Today  take parcel from domestic carrier which  is carried for DPD  
parcels in Bulgaria.
take from their office.
Stupid company  keep parcel 6 days in their  warehouse and not   
delivered ....less than 1km from their  office is delivery  address.
I'm very very  nervous because of  their bad delivery I  miss yacht  
famous regatta (parcel was main sail for yacht)
Please inform DPD how bad partner  they  have here.
If you  not informed me...maybe  parcel will stay more many days in  
their warehouse.

Best  Regards

Enter your question / concern:	I have asked eBay to step in on a return and have not yet received a response from you. This is regarding the Latek Philippe watch I purchased for $999 + $30 shipping. I notified you after the purchase but prior to receiving the item since the item was listed as authentic and from Pittsburgh, PA but, in fact, it came from Hong Kong, China. I have taken the watch and box to an authorized dealer and both are fakes. The Seller has offered to credit me $600, which just goes to show it is, indeed, a fake/unauthentic item. I need eBay's help with getting a full refund for this item in the amount of $1,029.00.  Thank you. Regards - Eggward/Graham Michener

Thank you for reaching out. The customer has opened a return case which we
gladly accepted and provided prepaid return labels right away. I have
issued 4 shipping labels to the customer via email but I was only able to

The customer has all 4 prepaid labels and can ship the item back. I am not
sure why the customer has not shipped the item back yet as per the return
case since the return labels were in her possession since 9/26/2016. I am
also not sure what intentions the customer has as they proceeded to open a
case even though we have been nothing but helpful in accepting her return
and issuing labels.

customer if they are claiming they have not received it. Please assist,
thank you!

subject: Re: Regarding the Joie mirus Scenic Stroller, item # 121945549416 SR# 1-84634921245
body:
Dear Christopher, 

Thank you for the explanations but I still want to precise several points as it is the first time I use EBay and surprised that there is no way to get my purchase in case I made mistake in the delivery address. Or being reimbursed for the purchase. 
So you're saying that my item was most probably liquidated and that there is no way to be reimbursed? Did I get you right?

I've checked what other people are saying about similar cases as apparently I am not the only one to make mistakes in address for whatever reason.
Here are some cases indicated in the eBay community and no one says about liquidation of purchases that had false address. 
Let me know if there are any options in my case to be reimbursed. 

Thank you in advance,
Zoya

----
Best,
Zoya Katashinskaya

Hello Dave,¬†I have read through the email about the needed actions. I actually went to the manufacturer to ask them about the product counterfeit before making the claim to eBay. The manufacturer agreed with me that the item I got is not authentic. Although the manufacturer confirmed the fact to me, but they would not take further steps because they said I purchased the item through a third party (eBay); so I need to contact the third party/seller, not them. They would not provide further assistance.¬†I attached a photo that I took during that trip in this email. The left one is authentic and the right one is the one I got (you may not feel the material through the photo, but it is clear that the right one has loose chain & the ribbon material and color are different).¬†¬†I attached more photos of the item I received here. You can see clearly that it is not at all authentic or anything like the seller described. If you open the pdf file, it is the messages that the seller sent me after I sent her questions about the authentic of the product. The seller agreed that it is not authentic and said she will give me a¬†full refund on Sep 27. But I have waited and until this very moment (5 Oct), I haven‚Äôt got the refund. Also, you can see the first message of the claimed case I sent to the seller with more details and photos of how the item is not at all 100% authentic as the¬†description s
